item.description:
Agenda:

07:00-07:30 Fast-paced networking
07:30-08:00 Talk: Online Marketing Using Videos
08:00- Discussion & networking

The talk will be given by Matt Peters & Brennan White of Pandemic Labs. The talk will be on some case studies of online marketing using videos and best practice tips.

Pandemic Labs is a marketing firm that specializes in viral and social media marketing. Their services include social media strategy, creative, production, seeding, and tracking. Their blog is at http://www.pandemicla....

Location:
Wanamana Faneuil Hall - Quincy Market Building

Wagamama is an award-winning asian-inspired noodle restaurant. enjoy freshly made noodle and rice dishes, healthy juices, salads, sake, and asian beers all in a sleek yet simple setting.

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Online Marketing Using Videos
